name: Time to sing Carols
description:
• This game was made in 2 days for the Winter Holidays.
  • You are a carol singer who want to spread the Christmas spirit in all the houses.You can have more people that are helping you, also you can make more money by buying upgrades.In the end, if you have 100 Lei, you can go back home and relax.

          I hope you enjoy it! : D

Controls

  • Click 

Type

  • Clicker

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Photoshop
  • Audacity 

How to Download

  • Download the.zip folder and locate it on your PC.
  • Right click on it and select "Extract All."
  • This will extract all the game files into a folder on your PC. Activate the executable and enjoy!
